name: Pregnancy Experience Interview
description: Brief interview focusing on overall pregnancy experience and key moments.

questions.text: Tell me about yourself - your age, where you live, and what you do.
When and how did you discover you were pregnant? What was your initial reaction?
Describe your experience with prenatal healthcare. What has been positive or challenging?
What physical changes have you experienced during pregnancy? How have you coped with them?
How would you describe your emotional journey through pregnancy?
Who has been there to support you? How important has that support been?
What has been the biggest challenge you've faced during pregnancy?
What are your hopes and concerns as you approach delivery and motherhood?
